website_summaries.verdict: Look dapper in the office or while on the boat when you don the OluKai Mohea Moku. It features lightweight materials that make walking a breeze and also helps during wet situations. Though there were some issues with durability and bad odor developing with use, those haven’t stopped fans of this men’s walking shoe from repurchasing it. It has become their go-to trainer for everyday walking comfort.
pros: The OluKai Nohea Moku is described as one of the most comfortable trainers by almost all of the owners
A majority of the users are satisfied with the grip of the outsole, especially on boats
Many people love that this pair of walking shoes can transform into sliders
A good number of reviewers appreciate the light and breathable top as they can wear this footgear with or without socks
Plenty of wearers find the arch support on this model to be adequate
According to a lot of consumers, this footwear relieved their foot and ankle pains
Droves of purchasers like that this merchandise pairs well with both business casual and beach/boat attires
cons: Several individuals have noted that the roomy toe box caused them to slide forward in the Nohea Moku
Some buyers are dismayed that the upper was not very durable and quickly developed holes or tears
More than a few critics are disgruntled that this shoe doesn’t dry fast and develops a foul odor

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, not so great durability!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but not durable. I owned two pairs, both lasted 3-4 months when the mesh started coming apart at the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Teklover

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Go-To Summer Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have had Sperry's and various other breathable light "boat" shoes. These are very very good. Very comfortable. I wear sockless most of the time, but fine with socks as well. These Olukai's- I knew they made very high priced but super high quality flip-flops. But these shoes are very good as well. Very comfortable very good soles that are water/slip resistant. If you look, the back/HEEL part is made to lay down if you choose to wear them as a slip on/ no heel shoe. I prefer to wear as a shoe. Great with shorts or pants, I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary B. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for those of us with tailors bunions
customer_reviews.text: This shoe restored my ability to walk! No kidding, and no smack on the forehead by a crazy preacher required. I have tailors bunions on both my feet and these shoes are about the only thing I've found that both 1. do not irritate the bunion, and 2. don't look like a medical slipper. I wear them as my standard work/office shoe now after years of wearing New Balance. NBs are also known for their wide-set bunion-friendly profile, and that was fine enough until I turned 40. After going through a half-dozen different shoes and having my bunions get progressively more painful, I stumbled onto these and - voila! - all my problems were solved.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Stine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but feel these shoes are overpriced for the quality
customer_reviews.author: RV gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Clouds for my feet 👣😊
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the slip ons that this company offers, these seem to fit true to size. I wear a u.s. 10 and the size 10 here fit perfectly. They were comfortable right out of the box and I can imagine walking all day in these things.. Unbelievably soft and comfortable if you are looking for something with higher than average arches you may need to look for a different insert but for most people this shoe will feel wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: VERY Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who works on a boat all day. We love their sandals so we figured their shoes would give the same comfort and support. WRONG! He compared them to standing on cement with bare feet all day. They are also slippery when they get wet, not great to wear on the boat or around water. Sizing seemed a bit big and they are not adjustable. They look nice, but that is about it!
customer_reviews.author: Paradise INC

customer_reviews.title: Ultra comfortable but flawed shoe inserts
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the OLUKAI shoe for three months and already experiencing defective or flawed shoe inserts. The OLUKAI company claims the inserts are washable and durable. However, I have not yet washed them because in only a few short months the inserts are becoming worn and frayed despite a few months of light casual wear. I have attempted to reach out to the OLUKAI company; however, no response nor no insert replacement has been sent.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne S. Daughtry

customer_reviews.title: Great Looks and comfort. A little wide and a little long. Order 1/2 size down.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look and feel great. I would say there a little wider than your typical shoe and to me they seem they run a bit large. I don't remember the last time I wasn't a size 12 in a shoe. On this one there is a little too much wiggle room and I feel that will result in discomfort. I am returning and getting a size 11.5. If you wear these barefoot that extra wiggle room will result in irritation almost guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: AJ86

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable as shoe or slipper.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. The first pair is over 2 years old and I still continue to wear them. I use them mostly as slippers with the heal stomped down but they are equally as comfortable as a shoe. I am 72 years old and my feet seem to have become more sensitive with age but these are quite comfortable. I slip them on first thing in the morning and usually wear them for my morning walk with the dogs and then switch to my every day shoes. Love them and just ordered my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bludawg

customer_reviews.title: Supremely comfortable, great color choices!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a woman with wide feet, and it’s nearly impossible for me to find comfortable shoes that fit properly. When I do, they are usually men’s shoes, and the color offerings are atrocious (to me anyways!) - lots of bright reds, blacks, yellows, etc. The OluKai men’s line has awesome neutral and natural colors that can be worn by anyone! And most importanly, this shoe is insanely comfortable - my foot can spread out naturally with no compression. Just fantastic. Buy a pair, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable, versatile
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and breathable, suitable for office use and casual hangouts. These are great on the bike (no laces to get tangled in the cranks or chain) and can be worn with or without socks. They also pack down quite nicely in luggage or a backpack. Regarding fit, because the "laces" are ornamental, these shoes rely on an elastic material to maintain a snug fit. At my normal size, I had to get used to a little extra play. Consider ordering a half size down, especially if you might wear them with thin/no socks. Oh, in less than a year, they've drawn several unsolicited compliments. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN G HOLDENER

customer_reviews.title: Cool old man shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these. He thinks they are comfortable. Loves the part in the back you flip down to use as slide on shoes. This is his third or fourth pair of OluKai shoes so they must be good. The color is a nice nuetral gray/blue but for some reason they look like old man shoes to me. Cool ones but senior citizen looking for sure. This was confirmed by my fathers interest in obtaining a pair
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa DC

customer_reviews.title: wonderful shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely cool and breathe-able, which I love. They keep your feet cooler than even the most breathe-able running shoes, for example. They are also quite comfortable on wide 2E feet, as they are reasonably wide and made of stretchy fabric. They also look good. They're my favorite shoes. The one drawback is that if you get the fabric snagged on something, you'll rip a hole in them, which is not hard to do. My first pair lasted about 16 months of almost daily use before that happened, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect guy's warm weather shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect summer shoe! My usual summer "uniform" is with Keen sandals. These are slightly more "formal" so I cam wear them anywhere, from beach to pretty nice restaurant with long trousers. They are incredibly cool and light and dry quickly after splashing through summer rain puddles. These are slip on...the lace as pictured is just a decorative feature. I wear a 14EEEE is just about any shoe, but the 14D in these shoes is perfectly comfortable because of the slight "give" in the uppers. One caution...the sole is light and flexible, not suitable for hiking over rocks or coarse gravel.
customer_reviews.author: pxriver

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh. Okay
customer_reviews.text: Week one: Excellent shoes. Love them. Great for slipper type or full fit. A couple months in: A few issues a few months. They smell very bad once they get wet. No other shoe I own does this. And these are made for wet locations. Also, the rubber in the back on the sole is peeling off. I am not hard on these shoes, and expected much better from the cost and brand.
customer_reviews.author: leonard salamida

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable and versatile shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is extremely comfortable because of its wide toebox and the fact that it’s a slip on. That said, you still have to buy the correct size or the shoe will be too roomy and floppy on your foot. But it’s quite versatile for all sorts of different dress and situations. Both thumbs way up for this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: raiderred

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes and will buy again. It feels like sandal with a breathable mesh around it. Great shoe if live in hot climates. It a shoe that can get wet and not the end of the world as drys fairly quick. I find these as was looking for a shoe to go to Costa Rica with and wish I found them sooner. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I love Olukai footwear & wanted something new & comfortable to take on an upcoming cruise. The shoe is what I expected (& hoped for) - loose fitting (relaxing) & sized correctly in the length (I wear a 9 1/2 & that's what I ordered). I did add a different insole due to having flat feet (the one in the shoe is removable) & the shoe not having a lot of support. That addition made the shoe perfect! I couldn't wait for vacation - I have worn them several times already! They have worn well & look great!!!
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I was looking for a shoe to replace some old comfort shoes that I have had for to many years to count , so my wife got me these and wow almost as broken in as my old shoes. Super comfortable and way nicer than my old ones. One thing I had to get used to was the soles are super sticky maybe not sticky but man do they grab on everything. No sliding your feet on the ground lol. Just a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jer

customer_reviews.title: Best everyday shoe I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been my favorite everyday shoe in years. Comfy like slippers yet you can wear them with about anything and they look great. I put some insoles in mine, but I need arch support. I’ve been wearing these a ton, lots of use. I got teenage boys that are onto these now and take mine so bought another pair. Plus, take a magic easer around the outside of the rubber sole every now and then with Clorox and these polish up like new. If I went on a 30 day, cross country trip and was told I could only bring two pair of shoes.... I’d bring both of my pairs of this shoe. You won’t regret buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been my husbands "go to" s since receiving the first pair last year. Comfortable, light weight and incredibly durable. He removes the insoles and runs them through the washing machine when necessary and they come out looking brand new. Unfortunately I had to return this purchase of an alternate color because Mr. Wonderful shopped the same day, went out and bought himself the same shoe!
customer_reviews.author: DKBMcG

customer_reviews.title: As Good As Flip Flops
customer_reviews.text: Have several pair of OluKai flip flops and swear by them. This is my first pair of shoes by them and glad I pulled the trigger. Very comfortable and stylish. When it gets warm I usually give up all shoes and live in flip flops...these will definitely make it into my summer rotation. Might even grab another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: sgurg

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm on pair number two of these and have a couple slip on versions also. Love these things, they have been my go to spring/summer shoes the last few years. The mesh their made of isn't the most durable and they fit fairly snug in the toe box, so keep your toe nails clipped or you'll get a hole in about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and are good comfortable summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are what I had expected. They fit well and are good comfortable summer shoes. My concern is wear and tear. I am starting to see some mesh breakdown in the big toe area on both shoes. This is a shame as I have not had them long, maybe little over a month. For this price, I would expect that this kind of wear and tear to not be an issue so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kern

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a big fan of OluKai shoes for a while, and these are my favorite pair so far. They look great, slide on and off easily, and seem very well made- actually the best of the shoes I've bought from them. The only issue I had was they were a little loose- I ended up tightening the laces a bit in a knot and tucking it inside. Now it fits perfect. They're fine for my work casual office as well as most social occasions. In fact, I find them more comfortable than sneakers so I wear them all the time. Keep it up OluKai!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T Bowman

customer_reviews.title: TRUE COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a recent vacation to The Mid Gulf Coast of Texas. They were so comfortable, couldn't tell I had them on. The footbed gives just the right amount of support. I wore them fo 18 hrs several days.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z.

customer_reviews.title: Cured Plantar Fascitis
customer_reviews.text: A little wide, but then it's a men's shoe since Olukai doesn't make the same arch support in women's styles. Olukai shoes have cured my plantar fascitis and I will continue to buy them, just not the women's. These are pretty cute though and fit decent for a man's shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JenJ

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband as a gift and he loves them so much. He's had them about 2 years and wears them a lot throughout the week. They're lightweight and easy to slide on and off and we just toss them in our wash machine when they get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Poncio

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: A flip-flop, a slipper and a deck shoe walked into a bar one night and got hammered. Nine months later this love child was born from their three-way. Seriously a comfy shoe that fits like a glove and leaves my feet happy at the end of a long day.
customer_reviews.author: J. Woodrow

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable slip on shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size 13 and I thought they would fit fine. They feel a bit loose when I walk around. When I slip them on the shoes don’t easily stay on my feet which is a bummer. I used them on a walk with my son and they were not great for the 6 miles we covered around the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Bill L.

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice But Kind of Big
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and quality of these shoes. I'm a middle aged guy trying to thread the style needle between young and cool vs old and given up. These shoes definitely don't look like something a teenager would wear. But they are way too stylish for the old folks home. My only issue is that they run a little bit big. I have a size 10 foot and these are definitely a little floppy in 10. I like the shoes to much too return them so I'm going to get a cheap insole to make up the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Fulbright

customer_reviews.title: OluKai Nohea Moku Shoe - Men's Rock/Mustang
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected. The uppers are stretchy material that almost feels like neoprene - very comfy. The soles have a great texture, more like rubber than plastic, with a nice grip. Excellent quality and workmanship. The best features of water socks and boat shoes. A summertime must.
customer_reviews.author: DRitch45

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands been recovering from several surgeries and I was tired of seeing him in skippers. Very attractive and they fit his size 13 foot well. Wide in toe area so no need for wide width. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: P Stress

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and super comfy
customer_reviews.text: My favorite slip on I've ever owned. Lightweight and super comfy. Walked all over a theme park with them and never had aches or discomfort from walking or standing most of the day. Your feet feel really supported by the Olukai insert. And that arch support is what always brings me back to their sandals and shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe, Odd Insert
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but the insert is weirdly designed. Why is there an arch on the outside of my foot? I ended up cutting off the outside 1⁄2 inch of the inserts to make them fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gant

customer_reviews.title: These are extremely comfortable when worn normally
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable when worn normally. If they are worn as slip-ons (the back folded down), they are horribly uncomfortable and look ridiculous. I highly recommend them (to be worn normally), and will repurchase when they are worn out.
customer_reviews.author: bree

customer_reviews.title: Great for water
customer_reviews.text: If your feet are exposed to moisture or sweat a lot these do very well. A little pricey but they do the job well and look great. You can even wear them as casuals to work.
customer_reviews.author: sirnatesalot

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, good looking and long wear!
customer_reviews.text: Hubs Bought a pair a few years ago in Florida and loved them! Looked but couldn’t find in stores. Bought the last pair in his size on Amazon. Would’ve bought two pair if we could. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanG

customer_reviews.title: and it is easy to wear a hole by your little toe as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have purchased for my husband. He loves them and (almost) will not wear anything else. They are soft, however, and it is easy to wear a hole by your little toe as your foot can slide back and forth. They look great with jeans AND slacks, which allows him to avoid wearing his nicer (and less comfortable) shoes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Koop

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but..
customer_reviews.text: As with a number of Amazon products I have purchased, there was a slight manufacturing defect. There was no stitching along the left side of the tongue on the right show. Because you pull on the tongue to get the shoe on your foot, I am concerned that this could be a longer term issue with the shoe. After a few months of wearing them, the thread from the tongue is already hanging loose in the shoe and I have to be careful with the way that the pull tab separates from the tongue when I put on the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great for wider feet
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight, airy, and do not pinch the top or sides of your feet. These for true to size for length. I have wider than average feet and so excited and thankful for these shoes! If you're looking for a looser fit in the toe box try these out.
customer_reviews.author: StevenD925

customer_reviews.title: More like Bro-lukais!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely frothing to have these bad boys show up on my doorstep. Me and the boys love to where our Olukai’s for a day out on the boat, beach, and even to the office with a pair of khakis. Very durable and stylish shoes to flex your drip on the weekend while drinking some tasty brews. Me and the boys even made a new nickname for these: Brolukais, because of the relaxed and chill vibe you possess when wearing them. 10/10 would recommend Shaka mahalo my dawgs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look totally awesome and they are comfortable, too. I DO NOT wear socks so these shoes are good for that right out-of-the-box. Note: I make sure to remove the insole every day after wearing (and wash it) for proper sanitation. To go with these shoes, I also bought the SuperFeet insoles (separately) to replace the OluKai insoles. That way I always have a clean insole to wear with the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: G. Vanpelt

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be well made. I was not a fan of how loose and floppy they felt. I'm usually a size 11 and that's what I ordered. I think the elastic fixed position lacing was a problem. The footbed, though extensively contoured, did not feel well designed or comfortable. Return was painless.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Fun for leisure
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to be like sneakers but, with a bit more polish! They are basically 2 tone - the navy is most prominent but, you can see the red undertones across the shoe - fit well and love this brand!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fiene

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, durable, shoes...wait, sandals? Both
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip out of the country to a humid, wet climate and they worked like a charm. My feet stay cool and they dry really well. I have flat and wide feet and these shoes were perfect! Well worth the price. Be careful not to stub your toe or walk into prickly areas as these shoes will snag and fray after a couple of run-ins. Would definitely purchase when I wear these out.
customer_reviews.author: Dan KC

customer_reviews.title: Light, airy and comfortable - perfect for office job
customer_reviews.text: Needed everyday shoes for work. These are perfect. I’m also super lazy so don’t want to tie my shoes - again these are perfect. Easy to get on, comfortable to wear, love them.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Burnvoth

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of kicks.
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, but a little bit lose. Nice breathability. Can also put on a pair of ankle socks and wear them longer term. They look great with shorts, jeans, or Carharrts.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Evans

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a nice shoe...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of size 13, since that is my shoe size. But, they run BIG. They should mention this. I could have fit into a 12, probably.
customer_reviews.author: Sean A. Cavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Dude! These shoes are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing this brand for a while now, and finally decided to pull the proverbial trigger on these. I'm really glad I did. These shoes are so incredibly comfortable and go with just about any casual outfit I wear. If you're on the fence, just go ahead and get them, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: mwpoole79

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Not very
customer_reviews.text: The shoe seems to be well made and like the way heel drop's down for quick slip on, but I was very disappointed with comfort. Felt like I was walking barefoot on a hard floor. Really considered sending them back, but after taking out insole and replacing it with one I purchase at Rite Aid. Shoe is much more comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Fera

customer_reviews.title: Loose fitting shoes
customer_reviews.text: I would try a half size down from your normal dress shoes. The shoes themselves are just loose fitting. Comfy but feel like nice looking house shoes
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Love these comfortable slip-on shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third pair, not because they wear out fast, but because I wear them almost everyday but like to keep them looking like new. Easy to put on/off, and super comfortable. Pretty casual but stylin' enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, lightweight and great every day shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 10.5 and the 11 fit perfect. 10.5 was too snug fit my liking. First pair I got had stitching that came apart, next had a defect on the heel. Returned no problem got the pair I'm wearing now that fit and are holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect traveler
customer_reviews.text: Not only do they have arch support, they have unique support all the way around my foot. They definitely fit differently than most shoes. These are my first pair of OluKais. I loved them so much I purchased them in brown and black. I also tried them on in person before ordering them online. I would recommend doing so to make sure they fit your foot type.
customer_reviews.author: Murdoc II

customer_reviews.title: Breathes well, fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: They fit true to size, but may not feel like it. They have a nice wide toe box and due to the slip on nature, they may feel a little loose at first. You'll get used to that quickly. These have become my favorite everyday shoe. They breath incredibly well, so my foot stays comfortable all day. They have a somewhat minimalist feel, but a heavy duty sole. I hope they consider coming out with a more minimalist version to make a lighter weight version.
customer_reviews.author: Antoni

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 14 or 15 in all shoes. I ordered the size 14 first and they slipped off while walking. The size 13 fit great. These are very comfortable and lightweight shoes for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: texascraig123

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. This is my fourth pair of these shoes. I love them. They are great for both water and casual wear. Also very durable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kimzey

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe I've ever owned. Very good blend of minimalist footwear, while not looking like minimalist footwear. I bought three pairs. I'll buy these for as long as Olukai keep making them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Shaka Brah
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wear them all the time. Even if you can't get to the beach once you slip on these shoes you will feel like your at the beach. They are so comfortable it is like a warm hug for your feet. Treat yourself and try a pair.
customer_reviews.author: TMoney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about these shoes! I wear a size 14 extra wide, so I’m always wary about how shoes bought online will fit. I can say that these are without a doubt the best fitting, most comfortable summer shoes I have ever owned. I plan on buying at least a few more pair!
customer_reviews.author: Eric R

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely will buy several more pairs
customer_reviews.text: Very high-quality construction, very true to size fit. A little extra side room for the toes but exceptionally comfortable. Arch support was a little low but easily managed. Good traction on the boat, easy to get on and off but not accidentally. Absolutely will buy several more pairs
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mason

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE -LOVE THEM FOR WATER, DRESS, OR CASUAL USE.
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is the inserts wore out after 2 weeks but the manufacturer sent new inserts asap. Ordered a second color for different dress attire.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baima

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and true to size
customer_reviews.text: My husband rated these 8/10 for comfort. They just didn't look right on him. He has large feet (14 - which were true to size) and the shoes look a little boyish. We ordered black but the black looked almost blue.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lynn

customer_reviews.title: The shoes look great, but
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great, but, if you have a high instep, they are too tight to get into and stop the circulation on the top of you arch. Once on, they felt good, but were too tight because of the foot opening. If they were lace-ups, I'd be wearing them right now!
customer_reviews.author: Fishn777

customer_reviews.title: Be careful that you order shoes for the correct gender
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes, as I'd bought some at a West Marine before ordering another from Amazon......however, I ended. up getting a shoe that was a Female size as opposed to male, so those did not work
customer_reviews.author: markus hall

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to wear to work
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair in this brand and they all fit as expected. The Nohea Moku is a little tight to get on my foot at the back heal but not bad. Wearing these are like walking around in sandals. I can work in these when I don't need to be in "full business attire" and they look casual but nice. When I wear them out, and I will, I'll buy another pair. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Would like more arch support
customer_reviews.text: The fit is descent, a little on the wide side, however with partially flat feet I need adequate arch support.
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting, comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Since I started wearing this brand a couple of years ago I have come to love them. They are so comfortable & fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Light Airy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair - wanted another color - First pair sill wearing well - Thease shoes are light and airy - cool and comfortable, great travel and walking shoes also good traction even with gournd is wet.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing footbed
customer_reviews.text: The footbed in these shoes is amazingly comfortable. Highly recommend that they be tried on in person to make sure that the footbed fits before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: sarver

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, had an issue and they contacted me right back. Shoes are great, breathable and good quality. Worn around Disney for a week and had no issues. Ran about half a size large for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Smuckers743

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable boat shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with paying a hundred bucks for shoes but Olakai really hold up. Love these new boat shoes. The footbed is incredibly comfortable. They fit exactly as described and are quite comfortable without socks. Added bonus, they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey l McClure/Jenni McClure

customer_reviews.title: Love the heal feature...
customer_reviews.text: These run about 1/2 size larger than my son normally wears. I ordered them for the feature on the heal. It folds down and he can wear them as a clog. He does that with all shoes and it drives me crazy. Very stylish and comfortable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. These shoes are so comfortable. The Arch is great - I got true to my size shoe - fits great, but could have gone a half a size smaller. I know these will be my summer shoes for 2020!
customer_reviews.author: R. Haberstroh

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these shoes for a trip that included a lot of walking. He loves them. I like them because they’re not stylish than what he would normally wear
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W.

customer_reviews.title: easy waterproof slip on
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, fit great, waterproof, thin top and along with a comfortable bottom.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Rugged

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wear them daily for work and love them. I work about half the day in an office and the other half out in people’s yards. They seem to be holding up great and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wear them all the time!
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like? You can slip them on, wear them as regular shoes, tromp through sand, go in the water. These are perfect I wear them all the time around the house and even out.
customer_reviews.author: Derrek Krasnicki

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as good as my first pair.
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered the blue color and I love those. Goes with causual or dress casual, comfortable. The black is kind of weird though there is a line of green that runs down the laces and this limits the pants I can wear with these shoes. The fabric is a bit stiffer and less comfortable then my blue pair.
customer_reviews.author: ryan nolet

customer_reviews.title: Nice - but not great
customer_reviews.text: The insole had done bumpy irregularity along the outside. There were so many positive reviews I just hopped it would break in ok and it has pretty much has. They aren't as wow as the reviews I've read. If consider buying them again as long as the price doesn't increase.
customer_reviews.author: Bamm!

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and great fitting
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. For functional water shoes they fit great and feel incredible as well. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These are the best of the olukai shoes I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: These are the best of the olukai shoes I’ve tried. While still roomy and a little wide, the fit is Not as sloppy large as the Nohea canvas slip on. I was a bit surprised that the laces are not the usual tie up laces, but it working out. These are unadjustable stretchy elastic laces.
customer_reviews.author: G8rmike

customer_reviews.title: Just what I have been looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I wear 14 and these fit true to size. So glad I picked these as they are everything I had hoped. I took them on a fishing trip where I would also be white water rafting and these were awesome. They are super comfortable on dry land or in the water. They also dry relatively quickly if you take out the insole. I just bought another pair in a different color. I'm loving them.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Cherico

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great. They fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. They fit perfect. I bought true to size, 13, and they fit perfect. The toe box has a little extra side wiggle room, which is great for the type of casual shoes. I have been wearing them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Gossamer

customer_reviews.title: Note your sizing
customer_reviews.text: Wide shoe, measure your foot in cm. Narrow feet- order one size down from your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: ETI

customer_reviews.title: But I continue to buy their great products including the Nohea Moku
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Olukai shoes and "slippah's" since living on Kauai several years ago. Not there anymore. But I continue to buy their great products including the Nohea Moku. Very good walking shoe which looks and feels terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Richard DeTucci

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love these shoes. They are extremely comfortable, and I finally found a shoe I can wear without socks. I have never been able to wear shoes without socks, my feet just get way too sweaty​. But these are so ventilated and comfortable I can finally do it. I will likely buy another pair of OluKai shoes or sandals, they are just so darn comfortable, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This is not a great model for me.  Looks clown-like
customer_reviews.text: I take 11 in other styles, this one is too tight and the white laces, the red accents, the whole package looks too weird for me. sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lasagna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully comfortable. They are now my #1 choice. I have several pair.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes in the World!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Been wearing them to work everyday for 3 years. Love not needing to ties shoes. And the most comfortable design.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Van

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, these are very comfortable. I bought them to use on the boat because the a non marking and you can wade in them but I find myself wearing them around town when I want something light without socks. Actually wore them for a day at Epcot a few weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin R. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Wore out 1 pair and bought another
customer_reviews.author: rhines3995

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, look great and can be used flexibly
customer_reviews.text: My husband is on his second pair of these and loves them
customer_reviews.author: ChellyBean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my son and he loves them and they look so stylish👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite pair
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable shoe, and looks great from super casual up to classy casual. I love how light and breathable these are. They also pack really flat. For all of these reasons, they make great versatile shoes for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: Need half sizes; 14 is too large and the 13 is too small. Comfy, durable.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: I keep coming back to OluKai!!!
customer_reviews.text: I keep coming back to Olukai!!! Always well made and always extremely comfortable right out of the box. The Nohea is no exception to that rule! Instantly my favorite shoe. Feel confident in pulling the trigger on this one, you won't send them back!
customer_reviews.author: Chris&Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sizes really aren’t hard
customer_reviews.text: A pair of shoes so large, 100% chance they’d need returned. Something they found to charge me 50% for in the return for. Now it seems I’ve paid $47 to try on a pair of shoes and send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband. He says they’re the most comfortable shoes he’s ever owned and wears them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jody M.

product_meta.title: OluKai Mens Nohea Moku Low Top Lace Up Walking Shoes
product_meta.description: Designed to elevate the traditional boat shoe, we crafted the handsome Nohea Moku with an adventurous nautical life in mind. Always sure-footed and down for an adventure, the no-tie laces and stretch bootie construction for barefoot wear yield a shoe that’s equal parts terrestrial, amphibious, and adventurous.
feature_bullets: FEATURES: Our patented Drop-In Heel design offers both a shoe or slide functionality. Stretch bootie construction for barefoot wear and medial water drainage ports.

UPPER: Lightweight breathable mesh upper with a stretch air mesh tongue and gusset. Elastic lacing system for easy on/off use, medial water drainage ports and minimally lined with a soft breathable microfiber.

FOOTBED: Dual-density anatomical PU footbed with a polyurethane gel insert. Soft, quick-drying jersey knit or single layer mesh footbed cover for maximum comfort and breathability. Removable and washable.
OUTSOLE: All-weather, non-marking rubber cupsole with razor siping for traction on wet surfaces.
